name: Andruids Expansion Mods
description: Various modifications expanding Heroes III mechanics and elements. New creatures, skills, spells, objects and mechanics.
author: Andruids, M&M Community

chinese.name: 扩展模组（Andruids Expansion）
chinese.description: 修改并扩展了《英雄无敌III》的机制和元素，并添加了新的生物、技能、魔法、宝物和机制。
